Created an attachment (id=12313)
Simple testcase that causes ConcurrentMethodException in UML2SD views

What happens is that the trace model is currently updated concurently with a 
load in the SD view.
The method EIterator.next() checks that the list size has not change since last 
call. This looks like an EMF behavior to ensure integrity between writer and 
reader.
Two important things:
- the load that is interrupted like this was caused by the arrival of an 
UPDATE_MODEL profile event that is not the last one because the model is being 
updated again; when the view comes up, it is valid thanks to the last not 
interrupted load
- the exceptions are trapped in a catch block containing simply a call to 
printStackTrace explaining why Mani is seeing it in the first workbench console; 
such exceptions only cause the current trace interaction load to be given up; 
stack traces are not printed in the eclipse .log file (hopefuly...)

Do not hesitate to tell us if there is something wrong in those explanations.
